segments.text: Hello ! You're welcome to Guangzhou Fair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I'm from America . Here is my business card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Glad to meet you , Mr . Smith . My name is Wang and here is my name card . I'll be glad to do what I can for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! This is my first visit to the Fair . Everything is new to me . Would you please give me some information ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Glad to . The Fair is a big gathering taking place twice a year , thousands of businessmen from more than a hundred and fifty countries and regions are here to trade with China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ours is a company special in exporting leather products . And what about yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My firm has high standing in my country . My bank is the City Bank , New York . You may refer to it for my status .
segments.speaker: S2
